tasks.label: Push to GitHub Pages
tasks.command: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo main); git fetch origin || true; git pull --rebase --autostash origin "$BRANCH" || true; git add -A; if ! git diff --cached --quiet; then git commit -m "Quick update $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')"; else echo "No changes to commit"; fi; git push origin "$BRANCH"
